User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the Secure Talk application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

profilePictureUrl.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

Chat.title: Chat
Chat.description: Represents a chat session between users.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Chat entity.

participants.description: Map of user UIDs participating in the chat. The value is a boolean.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the chat was created.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a message within a chat.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Message entity.

chatId.description: Reference to the Chat this message belongs to. (Relationship: Chat 1:N Message)

senderId.description: Reference to the User who sent the message. (Relationship: User 1:N Message)

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the message was sent.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description: Represents a contact in a user's contact list.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Contact entity.

userId.description: Reference to the User who owns this contact. (Relationship: User 1:N Contact)

contactUserId.description: Reference to the User who is the contact. (Relationship: User 1:N Contact)

displayName.description: The display name for the contact.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user.

params.name: chatId
params.description: The unique identifier of the chat.

definition.description: Stores messages within a chat session. Includes denormalized 'chatId' for efficient querying.

params.name: chatId
params.description: The unique identifier of the chat.

params.name: messageId
params.description: The unique identifier of the message.

definition.description: Stores contact information for a user. Includes 'userId' to ensure that only the user can access their contacts.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user.

params.name: contactId
params.description: The unique identifier of the contact.
